text: Me bar arɨghiregham. Tarazi arɨmariar kuraba iniva arɨmighiram. Eghtɨ apaniba izɨ taraziv soghtɨ me arɨghiram. Eghtɨ men tarazi dagheba puvatɨghɨva, arɨmɨghiram. Eghtɨ gumazir men kuabar apangkuv aziva, me isɨ mozibar afamiba puvatɨgham. Eghtɨ men kuaba pura tintinibar afiar buaribar mɨn nguazim girɨv ikiam. Eghtɨ kuarazir pɨn mɨghagha aruiba ko asɨzir atiaba men kuabar amam.
